job_tasks.phrase: Jij gaat werken bij toonaangevende organisaties en bent verantwoordelijk voor geautomatiseerd testen volgens de hoogste standaarden.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of applying testing standards, which is a fundamental aspect of software development and integration, ensuring the quality and reliability of software products.

job_tasks.phrase: Je schrijft scripts, onderhoudt frameworks en breidt bestaande test-automation-oplossingen uit.
job_tasks.justification: Writing scripts, maintaining frameworks, and extending test automation solutions are direct software development tasks focused on building and improving testing infrastructure.

job_tasks.phrase: duikt in de wereld van Agile en DevOps.
job_tasks.justification: Mentioning Agile and DevOps indicates involvement in modern software development practices that include operational aspects and continuous integration/delivery, aligning with the broader scope of MLOps/LLMOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Jij begrijpt de behoeften van de business, waardoor jij als verbindende schakel kunt optreden tussen verschillende partijen.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly refers to understanding business needs and acting as a link between parties, which falls under business understanding and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: Je gaat actief aan de slag met procesverbeteringen en bent betrokken bij het realiseren van de allerhoogste kwaliteit binnen je team.
job_tasks.justification: Focusing on process improvements and achieving high quality within a team involves understanding business objectives and contributing to strategic quality goals.

soft_skills.phrase: Jij begrijpt de behoeften van de business, waardoor jij als verbindende schakel kunt optreden tussen verschillende partijen.
soft_skills.justification: Acting as a connecting link between different parties directly relates to communication and collaboration skills.

soft_skills.phrase: Jij begrijpt de behoeften van de business
soft_skills.justification: Understanding business needs is a key aspect of business understanding and strategy.

soft_skills.phrase: bent betrokken bij het realiseren van de allerhoogste kwaliteit binnen je team.
soft_skills.justification: Being involved in realizing quality within a team implies collaboration and communication to achieve shared goals.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on test automation, scripting, framework maintenance, and integration within Agile/DevOps environments. While it mentions understanding business needs and quality, these are in the context of software engineering tasks. There is no mention of AI, ML, LLMs, or generative models. The technologies listed (Tosca, Playwright, Selenium, Robot Framework) are standard test automation tools, not AI/ML specific. Therefore, the role is classified as a 'Software Engineer' as it involves core software development practices without any AI/ML specialization.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and specific about its requirements, focusing exclusively on test automation engineering. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
